inclusionRule: LOWER(NAME) LIKE '%mail%' OR (size(filter(FREQUENT_VALUES, v -> LOWER(v) RLIKE '^[-a-z0-9~!$%^&*_=+}{\'?]+(\.[-a-z0-9~!$%^&*_=+}{\'?]+)*@([a-z0-9_][-a-z0-9_]*(\.[-a-z0-9_]+)*\.(aero|arpa|biz|com|coop|edu|gov|info|int|mil|museum|name|net|org|in|pro|travel|mobi|[a-z][a-z])|([0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}))(:[0-9]{1,5})?$')) / size(FREQUENT_VALUES)) >= 0.8f
name: Email_Copy_v2
description: This data element classification classifies columns based on the metadata and data values that match any valid email address format. This classification can infer emails in the format john.doe@yourdomain.com.
